review_details:
This place in not only about its location and facilities. It’s also about the host! We were warmly welcomed met and explained everything as well as cherished with a homemade cake and olive oil.
The room was facing the sea and the garden. Very close to the beach, tavernas, shops , vineyard, bus stop and whatever you need on your holiday. The area itself is quiet , at the same time you will find what you need: a place to eat, shops, busstop are at your hand. Highly recommend.
reviewFor: Kefalonia, Lourdata: studios near Lourdas beach, swimming pool, sea view

reviewTitle: Our very first place on Kefalonia❤️
review_details:
This place in not only about its location and facilities. It’s also about the host! We were warmly welcomed met and explained everything as well as cherished with a homemade cake and olive oil.
The room was facing the sea and the garden. Very close to the beach( you have to walk though) tavernas, shops , vineyard, bus stop and whatever you need on your holiday. Highly recommend.

Higly recommend! The food to die for. Seriously I have never eaten more delicious seafoon. A very relaxing atmosphere on a boat. Fun for kids and adults! You can swim, help with unneting the fish or whatever. Amazing views and very hospitable and helpful hosts! Will do it again! Thank you so much️
